QuestData.Title: The Vile Blood of Demons
QuestData.Description: Sharim wants demon blood. Speaking personally, the stuff does not even seem like blood to me - more like liquid rot - but that is of no consequence.$b$bLuckily for you, the area around the Dark Portal is crawling with demons. Infernals, felhounds, felguards... they've all got what you need, in copious, pustulent amounts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 7 bottles of Vile Demonic Blood.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ugh, what's that smell? Is that you, or the blood?
QuestData.RewardText: There is no doubt about it, you have found demon blood.$b$bKasim's requests aside, I am sure that my Watch Commander is thankful for your efforts. They have been struggling to deal with these demon distractions for some time now.
